ygData.subject: Re: Lizard Man
ygData.msgSnippet: ... They ... all the ... (they ... they had a ... I dont know about hating everyone, but im sure they are going to be another evil race...if they hated
ygData.messageBody:
> From: "Mifsud, Michael" <Michael.Mifsud@...>
>
>I really hope they are evil and xenophobic like the lizards in CT.
They
>worship and evil god but hate EVERYONE. Im sure its a racial since
all the
>races of norrath with maybe the exception of trolls are demi-humans
(they
>all look like modified humans). I also think it would be cool if
they had a
>bank for them in Cazic Thule or some such.

I dont know about hating everyone, but im sure they are going to be another
evil race...if they hated everyone who would they team up with on the new
server that is coming out.. ( the race war server) i think verant has no
intention of putting up a bank in CT for them as well...People asked about
getting a bank in Crush for the Evil races but to no avail.

>To make up for them being super-evil (i.e. not even dark races like
them)
>give them awesome attributes.

im guessing they are gonna have some sweet agility and dex if they are
monks, probably so so str and sta. Hrm, i still wonder if they will have any
casters........

>IMHO.

>But they do sound pretty cool.

>And hey, whats wrong with Diablo2? Im looking forward to it. Im
in a
>dilemma at the moment EQ or Aliens vs. Predator, decisions,
decisions.
>sigh, I miss the days of being able to FINISH games.

Heh dont get me wrong, ill be frist in line when D2 comes out trust me, but
that sure as hell doesnt mean Eq is going on the shelf at all! No way! heh i
got aliens vs predator as well....man that game rocks....gotta love playing
the alien. Walk on the ceiling busting all the lights so all the Humans run
around blindly so i can eat em! Muwuhahahahha


>Ahhh who am I kidding, I love MRPG :)

=)
